price: 50. Mpe basali likita ya mabe, mpe tosalelaki bango lokola, kasi bazalaki koyeba te.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
